GapFillDragDrop.Title: any/every/no/some
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 Excuse me. Do you have any vacancies at the moment?
2 I'm afraid I couldn't find anything in your size.
3 In my opinion there's nothing worse than dishonesty.
4 We don't buy our food there; everything in that shop is too expensive.
5 Could I offer you some tea or coffee?
6 I think there's something wrong with my car, it's making a strange noise.
7 I've sent invitations to everybody on the guest list.
8 The children have eaten all the food!
9 She doesn't know it very well; she's only been there once before.
10 Unfortunately there's nowhere to buy petrol near here.
